ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks! I m level 56 now but I started the shawl quest two years ago. I believe I worked on the 5th shawl for over a year. Well, not the shawl itself, but
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks!
I'm level 56 now but I started the shawl quest two years ago. I believe I
worked on the 5th shawl for over a year. Well, not the shawl itself, but
getting my skill up. I think I started at level 48 or 49. Possibly 50. I
remained level 52 for almost a year. I haven't leveled in several months.
I'm almost 57 now. I have about 5 LDoN adventures under my belt.
I'm not sure if you can get all of the no drop items at your level. You need
75 no drop threads from crystalline spiders in velks for the 5th shawl, no
drop sirens hair from either Sirens Grotto or Cobalt Scar (as long as you
keep the sirens chain stunned you can kill them quickly), no drop swordfish
tooth from Sirens Grotto.. And I believe you need to have good enough
faction with the Coldain to start the quest to begin with. So you need to
have killed a few drakkel wolves and frost giants in GD or EW.
luv,
-Su

> Gratz!!
>
> Might I ask what level you are? I'm trying to start the shawl quest
> with my 40 Barbarian Shaman cause he could really use the Flowing
> Thought at the end, but didn't know if I was still to low to work on
> the firsth shawl
